title: Illegal UTF-8 in comment causes confusing error
body:
by **diltsman**: 
A comment with an invalid UTF-8 (0xa5 in my case) gives an error that says:
illegal rune in string

This error message is confusing and could be worded better.

Also, the line number is the number of the beginning of the comment (Line with /*) and
not the line 
that has the invalid code point.

$GOOS=darwin
$GOARCH=amd64


Which revision are you using?  18440d66798d tip
